en.subject_template: Registration failed for Cable Modem {{mac}}{% if sid %} SID {{sid}}{% endif %}{% if interface %} on interface {{interface}}{% endif %}
en.body_template: Registration failed for Cable Modem {{mac}}{% if sid %} SID {{sid}}{% endif %}{% if interface %} on interface {{interface}}{% endif %}
en.probable_causes: The registration of the specified modem has failed because of an invalid or unsupported CoS setting.
en.recommended_actions: Ensure that the CoS fields in the configuration file are set correctly.
